analysis.description:
ElementiumVesting.release (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#154-173) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_token.transfer(_plans[iPlan].beneficiary,unreleased) (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#172-173)

ElementiumVesting._releasableAmount (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#128-154) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- j < nextStage (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#141-149)
	- nextStage < _plans[i].stages (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#132-154)

ElementiumVesting.release (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#154-173) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- nextStage > _plans[iPlan].stages (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#161-164)
	- require(bool)(unreleased > 0) (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#165)

ElementiumVesting._durationMonth should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#59-60)
ElementiumVesting._durationYear should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#60-63)
ElementiumVesting._milestone1 should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#57-58)
ElementiumVesting._milestone2 should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0x53fbaa187ed9eb5c67eb7b2e99674101ebcdd873.sol#58-59)
